sentences.en: Because of their incapacity to accept the eight - fold worldly conditions.
sentences.cn: 因为他们无法接受人世间那八层波动的现象.
因为他们承认了他们自己的无能.

sentences.en: Growing incapacity is coming with increasing age.
sentences.cn: 能力的丧失会随着年龄的增长而加剧.

sentences.en: He feigned illness or other incapacity in order to avoid duty.
sentences.cn: 他装病或装作其它形式的无能为力以逃避责任.

sentences.en: He lived from hand to mouth because of his incapacity to work.
sentences.cn: 由于无力工作,他勉强对付着过日子.

sentences.en: His incapacity for kindness makes everybody dislike him.
sentences.cn: 他不能与人为善,使得大家都讨厌他.

sentences.en: His ministers became weary of his incapacity as a leader.
sentences.cn: 他的大臣们却讨厌这个无能的领袖.

sentences.en: In earlier downturns, the jobless have been pushed off the claimant count and onto incapacity benefit.
sentences.cn: 在早期的衰退中, 失业者并不在救济申请者的名单之列,而被列在领取伤残救济的名单之中.

sentences.en: Piece surname goatherd is very indignant tongue - lash domestic sheep incapacity.
sentences.cn: 张姓牧羊人非常愤怒,大骂家羊无能.

sentences.en: Prudence is a rich, ugly old maid courted by Incapacity.
sentences.cn: 审慎是无能追求的一位富有而丑陋的老处女.
因病暂时不能正常生活和工作

sentences.en: The court have to act because of the incapacity of the trustee.
sentences.cn: 因为受托人无法律上的行为能力,法院不得不采取行动.

sentences.en: The only abnormality is th incapacity to love.
sentences.cn: 唯一的残疾就是缺乏爱的能力.

sentences.en: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
sentences.cn: 唯一的变态是不能去爱.

sentences.en: The pious Sweater would attribute it to idleness or incapacity.
sentences.cn: 这位虔诚的斯韦特就会把原因归之于懒惰成性或者缺乏才能.
他们缺乏有效治理的能力

words.tran_cn: 不能的；无能力的；不能胜任的
无能力；无资格；不能胜任
丧失能力，欠缺行为能力（incapacitate的过去分词）
使无能力；使不能；使不适于

trans.tran_cn: 无能力，伤残，（法律上）无行为能力
trans.tran_en: lack of the ability to do things or to do something
